title: An Act to establish a Massachusetts public bank

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Eldridge, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 736) of James B. Eldridge for legislation to establish a Massachusetts public bank.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
